node.text:
“Half of my life I grew up in Japan, half in Hawaii. Different parts of my life I’ve competed in that venue. Not everybody gets to say, you know, I represent a country I grew up in, but also a country my parents grew up in as well.” - #SakuraKokumai

For Karateka Sakura Kokumai, joining #TeamUSA at the #Tokyo2020 Games is symbolic of her own storied journey — where her childhoods in both Japan and America reach full circle at the Games.

Watch Sakura's film now on IGTV.

#PoloRalphLauren #RLxTeamUSA #TeamUSA #TokyoOlympics #Olympics

node.text:
“An artist has their canvas and their paintbrush. We have our skateboard, and then we have the skatepark. We can draw our own lines.” - #TeamUSA Skateboarder, #HeimanaReynolds

For Heimana, the board and park become ultimate platforms of creative and athletic expression.

Watch Heimana’s film now on IGTV.

#PoloRalphLauren #RLxTeamUSA #TokyoOlympics #Tokyo2020 #Olympics

node.text:
Our second episode spotlights the Olympic Fencing Silver Medalist, #DarylDHomer, as he prepares for the #TokyoOlympics with purpose and precision. 

On his training, Daryl says: “You don’t want to think when you’re on that stage. You do all the prep so your body can react subconsciously.”

Watch Daryl's full film now on IGTV.

#PoloRalphLauren #RLxTeamUSA #TeamUSA #Tokyo2020

node.text:
“For me, it’s about calming myself in those moments. You know, I’m not afraid of failure — I just have a really big opportunity to succeed.” - #HaylieMcCleney

As a dedicated athlete, Haylie understands the importance of presence, and keeping eyes to the now — both on and off the field.

Watch Haylie’s film now on IGTV.

#PoloRalphLauren #RLxTeamUSA #TokyoOlympics

node.text:
In our latest collection from #PoloRalphLauren, we feature artists from across the United States — including makers and artisans — to celebrate the rich landscape of America’s contemporary creators. 

Discover our Summer Americana collection via the link in bio.

#PoloRLStyle

node.text:
Sitting down with our athletes, we asked them to share their emotions on representing USA at the Tokyo 2020 Games.

Watch the full video to hear more from our ambassadors.

#PoloRalphLauren #RLxTeamUSA #TeamUSA

node.title: Our Team USA Athletes: What It Means to Be on Team USA

node.text:
As the golf season continues, #PoloRalphLauren is proud to support our Golf Ambassadors.

We are honored to welcome LPGA professional golfer, #AndreaLee, as the newest face of our Women’s Golf Brand, along with our #RLAmbassador #KathrynNewton.

Discover the latest #PoloGolf and #RLXGolf collections via the link in bio.

node.title: Raise Your Game with Kathryn Newton and Andrea Lee

node.text:
As they reflect on their Olympic and Paralympic journey, our #TeamUSA ambassadors share their experiences competing on a global stage.

“You’re standing with the entire Team USA delegation. Lights going everywhere flashes going everywhere. Everyone starts chanting: ‘USA, USA’ and it echoes off of the walls. It is just incredible” - U.S. Paralympic Triathlete, #MelissaStockwell. 

Watch the full video to hear more from our ambassadors. 

#PoloRalphLauren #RLxTeamUSA

node.title: Our Team USA Athletes: Competing on a Global Stage

node.text:
When we empower marginalized communities, we all rise. Through financial donations, sponsorships, and volunteer hours, we strive to uplift both internal and external communities, especially those which experience the greatest vulnerability. Over the last 30 years, Ralph Lauren has been a supporter of the LGBTQIA+ community, from sponsoring the AIDS Walk NYC since 1990 to scoring 100% on the 2020 and 2021 Human Rights Campaign Corporate Equality Index. 

Join us in our support of @StonewallFoundation via the link in bio.

#PoloRalphLauren #RLPride

node.text:
Presenting the latest #PoloRalphLauren men's collection — a journey over dirt roads, through the desert, discovering hidden coves and connections with nature. 

Featured here, our Garment-Dyed Denim Trucker Jacket is a modern take on the traditional silhouette, rendered in soft twill. 

Explore more #PoloRLStyle via the link in bio.

node.accessibility_caption: Photo shared by Polo Ralph Lauren on August 14, 2021 tagging @feed, and @nokidhungry. May be an image of one or more people and text that says 'FEED'.

node.text:
Since 2007, @FEED, an impact-driven brand founded by @LaurenBLauren, has helped provide more than 120 million meals to children globally, through their giving partners. 

Crafted with purpose, our Polo x FEED Polo Shirt provides 10 meals to school children in the US.

For each item sold from the #POLOxFEED capsule, 10% of the purchase price is donated to @NoKidHungry, whose average cost to provide a school meal is 10 cents. Learn more at www.nokidhungry.org.

Discover more from the capsule via the link in bio.

#PoloRalphLauren #PoloRLStyle

node.text:
Introducing the #POLOxFEED Field Jacket.

Designed with impact in mind, our Polo x FEED Field Jacket provides 50 meals to school children in the US.

For each item sold from the capsule, 10% of the purchase price is donated to @NoKidHungry, whose average cost to provide a school meal is 10 cents. Learn more at www.nokidhungry.org.

Discover our partnership with @FEED via the link in bio.

#PoloRalphLauren #PoloRLStyle

node.text:
In 2007, @LaurenBLauren, Ralph Lauren's daughter-in-law, founded @FEED after seeing, firsthand, the realities of childhood hunger. Her mission remains the same: to create products that help feed children globally.

New to the #POLOxFEED capsule, our Polo x FEED Field Jacket, provides 50 school meals to children in need.

For each item sold from the capsule, 10% of the purchase price is donated to @NoKidHungry, whose average cost to provide a school meal is 10 cents. Learn more at www.nokidhungry.org.

Learn more about our partnership via the link in bio.

#PoloRalphLauren #PoloRLStyle

node.text:
Playfully mixing versatile fabrics with charming details, our Fair Isle Wool-Blend Peplum Cardigan stitches together an array of hues and motifs finished with mismatched buttons and puffed sleeves.

Explore more back to school inspired #PoloRLStyle via the link in bio.

#PoloRalphLauren #RLKids

node.text:
Our latest collection from #RLKids brings traditions of #PoloRLStyle to Fall.

Designs in rich fabrications and soft colors — like our Fair Isle Wool-Blend Sweater and classic Cotton Denim Overall — capture the warmth of the season.

Discover the entire collection via the link in bio.

#PoloRalphLauren

Our multicolored Polo Pony motif, embroidered on the Color-Blocked Wool-Cashmere Sweater, complements the sweater's warm palette of autumnal hues.

The #PoloRalphLauren staple is matched here with lightweight trousers and suede Chelsea boots — capturing a fresh rendition of #PoloRLStyle.

Discover more soft separates from our #RLKids Back to School collection via the link in bio.

Finished with an American flag patch, our timeless #PoloRalphLauren denim jacket pairs with lightweight layers and a corduroy bucket hat for back to school moments.

Discover more #PoloRLStyle via the link in bio.
